readme:
# Orchid Atom Theme

Orchid is a dark but light syntax theme for [Atom](http://atom.io/). Shaded in radiant orchid and sprinkled with silky smooth transitions.

![](https://raw.github.com/hallodom/orchid/master/screenshot.jpg)
